data.title: Century French Novel. A Reader's Path to Classic Fiction
data.meta_description: Provides in-depth evaluations of forty-five French novels chosen as the most representative of nineteenth-century classic fiction. Selected titles are given succinct plot overviews followed by a thorough textural analysis. The evaluations provide a social, historical and literary context in order to capture both the readersâ€™ interest and their curiosity in order to entice them to discover these classic novels in their entirety.
